mods.name: SimpleOres
mods.description: SimpleOres is a Minecraft mod that adds several new ores and tools to the game, enhancing the vanilla experience with a touch of progression.

mods.name: JourneyMap
mods.description: JourneyMap lets you view a real-time map of your Minecraft world as you explore. The map can be viewed in a web browser or as an in-game minimap.

mods.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mods.description: Adds a wide variety of new biomes to the Overworld and the Nether, complete with new blocks, trees, plants, and more.

mods.name: Tinkers' Construct
mods.description: A mod that introduces a modular tool crafting system with a unique smelting and forging process.
